citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A Responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm-12:10pm
on May 14, 2024.
Upon arrival inspector honked and spoke with licensee. He indicated and that they were just headed out to a scheduled
event.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records is a serious violation of the Animal Welfare Act and
regulations. Failure to comply with these requirements may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A Responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm-12:10pm 
on May 14, 2024. 
Upon arrival inspector honked and spoke with licensee. He indicated and that they were just headed out to a scheduled 
event. 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records is a serious violation of the Animal Welfare Act and 
regulations. Failure to comply with these requirements may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
